verses.verse: And when king <S%H4428><s%> Arad <S%H6166><s%> the Canaanite <S%H3669><s%>, which dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in the south <S%H5045><s%>, heard <S%H8085><s%> tell that Israel <S%H3478><s%> came <S%H935><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the spies <S%H871><s%>; then he fought <S%H3898><s%> against Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and took <S%H7617><s%> some of them prisoners <S%H7628><s%>.

And Israel <S%H3478><s%> vowed <S%H5087><s%> a vow <S%H5088><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, If thou wilt indeed <S%H5414><s%> deliver <S%H5414><s%> this people <S%H5971><s%> into my hand <S%H3027><s%>, then I will utterly destroy <S%H2763><s%> their cities <S%H5892><s%>.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hearkened <S%H8085><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and delivered up <S%H5414><s%> the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%>; and they utterly destroyed <S%H2763><s%> them and their cities <S%H5892><s%>: and he called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the place <S%H4725><s%> Hormah <S%H2767><s%>.

¶ And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor <S%H2023><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the Red <S%H5488><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%>, to compass <S%H5437><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Edom <S%H123><s%>: and the soul <S%H5315><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> was much discouraged <S%H7114><s%> because of the way <S%H1870><s%>.

And the people <S%H5971><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> against God <S%H430><s%>, and against Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Wherefore have ye brought us up <S%H5927><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to die <S%H4191><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>? for there is no bread <S%H3899><s%>, neither is there any water <S%H4325><s%>; and our soul <S%H5315><s%> loatheth <S%H6973><s%> this light <S%H7052><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%>.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> fiery <S%H8314><s%> serpents <S%H5175><s%> among the people <S%H5971><s%>, and they bit <S%H5391><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>; and much <S%H7227><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> died <S%H4191><s%>.

¶ Therefore the people <S%H5971><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, We have sinned <S%H2398><s%>, for we have spoken <S%H1696><s%> against the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and against thee; pray <S%H6419><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, that he take away <S%H5493><s%> the serpents <S%H5175><s%> from us. And Moses <S%H4872><s%> prayed <S%H6419><s%> for the people <S%H5971><s%>.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Make <S%H6213><s%> thee a fiery serpent <S%H8314><s%>, and set <S%H7760><s%> it upon a pole <S%H5251><s%>: and it shall come to pass, that every one that is bitten <S%H5391><s%>, when he looketh <S%H7200><s%> upon it, shall live <S%H2425><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> a serpent <S%H5175><s%> of brass <S%H5178><s%>, and put <S%H7760><s%> it upon a pole <S%H5251><s%>, and it came to pass, that if a serpent <S%H5175><s%> had bitten <S%H5391><s%> any man <S%H376><s%>, when he beheld <S%H5027><s%> the serpent <S%H5175><s%> of brass <S%H5178><s%>, he lived <S%H2425><s%>.
¶ And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> set forward <S%H5265><s%>, and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in Oboth <S%H88><s%>.

And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Oboth <S%H88><s%>, and pitched <S%H2583><s%> at Ije-abarim <S%H5863><s%>, in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> which is before <S%H6440><s%> Moab <S%H4124><s%>, toward the sunrising <S%H4217><s%> <S%H8121><s%>.
¶ From thence they removed <S%H5265><s%>, and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in the valley <S%H5158><s%> of Zared <S%H2218><s%>.

From thence they removed <S%H5265><s%>, and pitched <S%H2583><s%> on the other side <S%H5676><s%> of Arnon <S%H769><s%>, which is in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> that cometh out <S%H3318><s%> of the coasts <S%H1366><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>: for Arnon <S%H769><s%> is the border <S%H1366><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>, between Moab <S%H4124><s%> and the Amorites <S%H567><s%>.

Wherefore it is said <S%H559><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of the wars <S%H4421><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, What he did <S%H2052><s%> in the Red sea <S%H5492><s%>, and in the brooks <S%H5158><s%> of Arnon <S%H769><s%>,

And at the stream <S%H793><s%> of the brooks <S%H5158><s%> that goeth down <S%H5186><s%> to the dwelling <S%H3427><s%> of Ar <S%H6144><s%>, and lieth <S%H8172><s%> upon the border <S%H1366><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>.

And from thence they went to Beer <S%H876><s%>: that is the well <S%H875><s%> whereof the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Gather <S%H622><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> together <S%H622><s%>, and I will give <S%H5414><s%> them water <S%H4325><s%>.
¶ Then Israel <S%H3478><s%> sang <S%H7891><s%> this song <S%H7892><s%>, Spring up <S%H5927><s%>, O well <S%H875><s%>; sing <S%H6030><s%> ye unto it:

The princes <S%H8269><s%> digged <S%H2658><s%> the well <S%H875><s%>, the nobles <S%H5081><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> digged <S%H3738><s%> it, by the direction of the lawgiver <S%H2710><s%>, with their staves <S%H4938><s%>. And from the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> they went to Mattanah <S%H4980><s%>:
And from Mattanah <S%H4980><s%> to Nahaliel <S%H5160><s%>: and from Nahaliel <S%H5160><s%> to Bamoth <S%H1120><s%>:

And from Bamoth <S%H1120><s%> in the valley <S%H1516><s%>, that is in the country <S%H7704><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>, to the top <S%H7218><s%> of Pisgah <S%H6449><s%>, which looketh <S%H8259><s%> toward <S%H6440><s%> Jeshimon <S%H3452><s%>.
¶ And Israel <S%H3478><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> unto Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Let me pass <S%H5674><s%> through thy land <S%H776><s%>: we will not turn <S%H5186><s%> into the fields <S%H7704><s%>, or into the vineyards <S%H3754><s%>; we will not drink <S%H8354><s%> of the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the well <S%H875><s%>: but we will go along <S%H3212><s%> by the king's <S%H4428><s%> high way <S%H1870><s%>, until we be past <S%H5674><s%> thy borders <S%H1366><s%>.

And Sihon <S%H5511><s%> would not suffer <S%H5414><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> to pass <S%H5674><s%> through his border <S%H1366><s%>: but Sihon <S%H5511><s%> gathered <S%H622><s%> all his people <S%H5971><s%> together <S%H622><s%>, and went out <S%H3318><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> into the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>: and he came <S%H935><s%> to Jahaz <S%H3096><s%>, and fought <S%H3898><s%> against Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And Israel <S%H3478><s%> smote <S%H5221><s%> him with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%>, and possessed <S%H3423><s%> his land <S%H776><s%> from Arnon <S%H769><s%> unto Jabbok <S%H2999><s%>, even unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%>: for the border <S%H1366><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> was strong <S%H5794><s%>.

And Israel <S%H3478><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> all these cities <S%H5892><s%>: and Israel <S%H3478><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in all the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, in Heshbon <S%H2809><s%>, and in all the villages <S%H1323><s%> thereof.

For Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> was the city <S%H5892><s%> of Sihon <S%H5511><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, who had fought <S%H3898><s%> against the former <S%H7223><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>, and taken <S%H3947><s%> all his land <S%H776><s%> out of his hand <S%H3027><s%>, even unto Arnon <S%H769><s%>.

Wherefore they that speak in proverbs <S%H4911><s%> say <S%H559><s%>, Come <S%H935><s%> into Heshbon <S%H2809><s%>, let the city <S%H5892><s%> of Sihon <S%H5511><s%> be built <S%H1129><s%> and prepared <S%H3559><s%>:

For there is a fire <S%H784><s%> gone out <S%H3318><s%> of Heshbon <S%H2809><s%>, a flame <S%H3852><s%> from the city <S%H7151><s%> of Sihon <S%H5511><s%>: it hath consumed <S%H398><s%> Ar <S%H6144><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>, and the lords of the high places <S%H1181><s%> of Arnon <S%H769><s%>.

Woe <S%H188><s%> to thee, Moab <S%H4124><s%>! thou art undone <S%H6><s%>, O people <S%H5971><s%> of Chemosh <S%H3645><s%>: he hath given <S%H5414><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> that escaped <S%H6412><s%>, and his daughters <S%H1323><s%>, into captivity <S%H7622><s%> unto Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>.

We have shot <S%H3384><s%> at them; Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> is perished <S%H6><s%> even unto Dibon <S%H1769><s%>, and we have laid them waste <S%H8074><s%> even unto Nophah <S%H5302><s%>, which reacheth unto Medeba <S%H4311><s%>.
¶ Thus Israel <S%H3478><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> to spy out <S%H7270><s%> Jaazer <S%H3270><s%>, and they took <S%H3920><s%> the villages <S%H1323><s%> thereof, and drove out <S%H3423><s%> <S%H3423><s%> the Amorites <S%H567><s%> that were there.

¶ And they turned <S%H6437><s%> and went up <S%H5927><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of Bashan <S%H1316><s%>: and Og <S%H5747><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan <S%H1316><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> them, he, and all his people <S%H5971><s%>, to the battle <S%H4421><s%> at Edrei <S%H154><s%>.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Fear <S%H3372><s%> him not: for I have delivered <S%H5414><s%> him into thy hand <S%H3027><s%>, and all his people <S%H5971><s%>, and his land <S%H776><s%>; and thou shalt do <S%H6213><s%> to him as thou didst <S%H6213><s%> unto Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, which dwelt <S%H3427><s%> at Heshbon <S%H2809><s%>.

So they smote <S%H5221><s%> him, and his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and all his people <S%H5971><s%>, until there was none <S%H1115><s%> left <S%H7604><s%> him alive <S%H8300><s%>: and they possessed <S%H3423><s%> his land <S%H776><s%>.
